contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} [[Image:BF-Yagha.png|right|250px|Location of Yagha Province in Burkina Faso]] [[Image:Yagha department.png|thumb|left|Location of Sebba]] '''Yagha''' is one of the 45 [[Provinces of Burkina Faso|provinces]] of [[Burkina Faso]], located in its [[Sahel Region]]. Its capital is [[Sebba]]. {{BurkinaFaso-provinces}} {{Coord|13|25|N|0|35|E|region:BF_type:adm1st|display=title}} [[Category:Provinces of Burkina Faso]] [[Category:Yagha Province| ]] {{Yagha-geo-stub}}
